##Raw versus Processed Data
* Raw data - Original source of the data
* Processed data - Ready for analysis

##Components of Tidy Data
* Raw Data
* Tidy Data Set
* A code book of each variable and value (and units)
* Explicit and exact recipe to go from 1 to 2,3
